title: Engineering Program Manager - Marketing Analytics
summary: The Apple Services Engineering team is one of the most exciting examples of Apple’s long-held passion for combining art and technology. These are the people who power the Wallet, Apple Gift Card, Apple Card, Apple Pay Later, App Store, Apple TV, Apple Sports, Apple Music, Apple Fitness+, and Apple Podcasts!
description: We're looking an experienced Engineering Program Manager (EPM) with the ability to ship complex and often cross-functional data engineer projects in the marketing domain. This is a hands-on position; the EPM will be involved in the initial intake and assessment of potential projects through all stages of project execution and delivery. The EPM should feel comfortable in all aspect of project management including, project scoping, requirements gathering, timeline and project planning, and reporting and communication to executive audiences. Additionally, the EPM will collaborate with a variety of cross-functional teams in the delivery of projects such as Data Science, Client and Server Engineering, Production Support, Quality Assurance, Information Security, Privacy Engineering and more. Finally, this is not a task based role. It has significant ambiguity which the EPM will need to successfully navigate to deliver projects on time and with high quality.
preferred_qualifications: Passionate about protecting privacy while delivery key product insights
